#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,arr1[100],arr2[100],val,x,max;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin>>arr1[i];
        }
           sort(arr1,arr1+n);
            for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                cin>>arr2[i];
            }
            sort(arr2,arr2+n);
           x=0;
           val=0;
           max=0;
           for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                val++;
                if(arr1[i]>=arr2[x]){

                    while(arr2[x] <=arr1[i]){
                          val--;
                          x++;
                    }
               }
                if(max<val){
                    max=val;
                }

           }
           cout<<max<<endl;
    }
    return 0;

}
